topic.title: The Russian Mafia is Jewish
topic.body:
Russian mafia is considered to be the most powerful crime syndicate in the world. The fact is that the “Russian” mafia is the Jewish mafia.
As the media is fully controlled by Jews they always present Jewish criminals as belonging to other nations.
Jewish gangs are the most ruthless because they hate all Gentiles.
http://www.veteranstoday.com/2016/12/02/the-judeo-russian-mafia-from-the-gulag-to-brooklyn-to-world-domination/
http://youtube.com/watch?v=FG_bACkcDL8
